name: @gkalpak/ng-slack-linkifier
description: Improves messages, especially links, in the `angular-team` Slack.

scripts.build: shx mkdir dist/ && shx cp index.js dist/ && node --eval "require('shelljs').sed('-i', /X\.Y\.Z-VERSION/g, require('./package.json').version, 'dist/index.js');"
scripts.test: run-s lint && node --print "'No tests yet.\n'" && exit 1

author: gkalpak <kalpakas.g@gmail.com>
